option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
#!/bin/bash set -euo pipefail
API_BASE=${1:-"http://localhost:8080"}
echo "Testing CV-JD Matcher API at: $API_BASE" echo
# Test health endpoint echo "1. Testing health endpoint..." if curl -s -f "$API_BASE/health" > /dev/null; then echo "✓ Health endpoint is working" echo "Response: $(curl -s "$API_BASE/health")" else echo "✗ Health endpoint failed" echo " - Is the backend running?" echo " - Check: docker compose ps" echo " - Check logs: docker compose logs api" exit 1 fi
echo
# Test root endpoint echo "2. Testing root endpoint..." if curl -s -f "$API_BASE/" > /dev/null; then echo "✓ Root endpoint is working" echo "Response: $(curl -s "$API_BASE/")" else echo "✗ Root endpoint failed" fi
echo
# Test CV list endpoint echo "3. Testing CV list endpoint..." if curl -s -f "$API_BASE/api/v1/cv/" > /dev/null; then echo "✓ CV list endpoint is working" response=$(curl -s "$API_BASE/api/v1/cv/") echo "Response: $response" else echo "✗ CV list endpoint failed" fi
echo
# Test JD list endpoint echo "4. Testing JD list endpoint..." if curl -s -f "$API_BASE/api/v1/jd/" > /dev/null; then echo "✓ JD list endpoint is working" response=$(curl -s "$API_BASE/api/v1/jd/") echo "Response: $response" else echo "✗ JD list endpoint failed" fi
echo echo "API test complete!" echo echo "If tests passed, open: http://localhost:4174" echo "The frontend should now connect to: $API_BASE"
